tool.name: XPath
tool.description: compute xpath expressions on XML data
tool.help: **What it does** Query XML files with XPath expressions. For an example input file:: 1234 1235 1236 1237 One could query out the IDs specifically with a query like:: //Id/text() **XPath Expressions** There are many helpful tutorials on the internet for XPath expressions. `Wikipedia `__ has a number of good examples. **Some More Examples** For an XML document like the following:: 1 2 3 4 5 Here are some example queries and their outputs: +====================+===================================================+ | Query | Result | +--------------------+---------------------------------------------------+ | //b[@attr="value"] | 1 | +--------------------+---------------------------------------------------+ | //b[@attr] | 12 | +--------------------+---------------------------------------------------+ | //b | 123 | +--------------------+---------------------------------------------------+ | //b/text() | 1\n2\n3 | +--------------------+---------------------------------------------------+ | /root/*/*/text() | 1\n2\n3\n4\n5 | +--------------------+---------------------------------------------------+ @ATTRIBUTION@
